reviewText: There were no "couple-yoga-moves" or any yoga moves not found in a basic yoga for dummies book. The two in the video were wearing thongs, but otherwise there was nothing intimate about the video, including any interaction... it's two skinny white people stretching next to each other.

This video helped to bring the romance back into my life.  I loved doing the yoga with Scott and Shawna.  Being an avid yoga practicioner, I think they are a very experienced yoga couple.  Everyone should purchase this video ... it's a must for the video collection.
